content: in three different sizes with a gorgeous diamond design and a light scent of cinnamon these argyle mosaic crochet pumpkins are a perfect project for halloween thanksgiving and the entire harvest season use these stuffed pumpkins as an eye-catching centerpiece or as a heartfelt gift to share with friends and loved ones these little pumpkins work up quickly and would make a great intro into the world of mosaic crochet they re also a fabulous stashbuster crochet pattern the pattern comes with written instructions and a chart as well as link to a full video tutorial or change per pattern unique features- mosaic crochet pumpkins in three sizes beautiful argyle design worked in overlay mosaic crochet detailed written pattern with chart and video tutorial for mosaic crochet basics makes a unique piece of decor or hostess gift for fall gatherings materials needed- stitch markers hook 4 5mm us size 7/g+ yarn dk weight 1 skein < 290 yds each two contrasting colors gauge 19 stitches x 20 rounds = 4 x4 square obtained from watch of pattern measuring on the ws
